name: OrderHandlingMilestoneExecution
comment: This entity tracks the status changes of different PONRs in the business flow. The event is triggered when there is a change in PONR information of the flow level changes. For example, when the flow starts, completes or encounters an error during the execution.
vf short description: This entity tracks the status changes of different PONRs in the business flow. The event is triggered when there is a change in PONR information of the flow level changes.

fields.name: OrderHandlingMilestoneExecutionSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ValidFromDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity begin in EDWH

fields.name: ValidUntilDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity end in EDWH

fields.name: KeyTypeId
fields.comment: Key type of record

fields.name: OrderHandlingMilestoneExecutionKey
fields.comment: Unique id for the Order Handling Flow PONR Tracking in aLDM. Generated Key based on Order Handling Flow Tracking Key and Order Handling Flow PONR Name

fields.name: MilestoneExecutionEventId
fields.comment: Identifier of the event. The event is triggered when there is a change in PONR information of the flow level changes. For example, when the flow starts, completes or encounters an error during the execution. OHFlowTrackingPONRNotification.eventId

fields.name: MilestoneExecutionEventTime
fields.comment: Creation date of the event. OHFlowTrackingPONRNotification.eventTime

fields.name: MilestoneExecutionEventTypeInd
fields.comment: Name of the notification resource. OHFlowTrackingPONRNotification.eventType

fields.name: ResourceVersionInd
fields.comment: Version of the associated resource entity OHFlowTrackingPONRNotification.flowTrackingEvent.resourceVersion

fields.name: OrderHandlingFlowSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: FlowTraceId
fields.comment: Trace ID for the flow history record. OHFlowTrackingPONRNotification.flowTrackingEvent.traceId

fields.name: OrderHandlingMilestoneName
fields.comment: Name of the PONR or milestone. For example, Shipment and Port-in. OHFlowTrackingPONRNotification.flowTrackingEvent.ponrName

fields.name: MilestoneTypeInd
fields.comment: Type of the PONR (or milestone)e.g.Business u00E2u20ACu201C This is business defined PONR. It is a way for the business to limit the flow actions. For example, the customer cannot cancel or amend the order.Technical u00E2u20ACu201C This indicates that a subsystem that does not support rollback operation has already been notified. Such systems must complete their operations and later on, this operation must be compensated or reverted by other means. For example, Fulfillment (SOM) PONR. OHFlowTrackingPONRNotification.flowTrackingEvent.type

fields.name: MilestoneAchievedDate
fields.comment: The date when the PONR was reached or milestone achieved. OHFlowTrackingPONRNotification.flowTrackingEvent.timeOfPONR

fields.name: StepName
fields.comment: The step name due to which the PONR activity was triggered. OHFlowTrackingPONRNotification.flowTrackingEvent.stepName

fields.name: StepInstanceId
fields.comment: The step instance id of the step due to which the PONR activity was triggered. OHFlowTrackingPONRNotification.flowTrackingEvent.stepInstanceId

fields.name: MilestoneStatusInd
fields.comment: Status of the PONR(or milestone) e.g. set, ignored OHFlowTrackingPONRNotification.flowTrackingEvent.status

fields.name: ModificationUserId
fields.comment: user id from the initiator token of the request that is triggering the PONR activity. OHFlowTrackingPONRNotification.flowTrackingEvent.modifiedBy

fields.name: FlowId
fields.comment: Unique ID of the flow allocated to an order item in the order. An order can have multiple flows hence there can be multiple flow context IDs. In case a flow is not external and is running in Order Handling system, there is a flow context ID. OHFlowTrackingPONRNotification.flowTrackingEvent.id

fields.name: FlowRunId
fields.comment: ID of the flow instance run.In case of a BPMN engine, this is the process instance ID returned by the engine.In case of Lite Orchestration, this is generated internally by the Order Handling framework. OHFlowTrackingPONRNotification.flowTrackingEvent.flowRunId

fields.name: SourceSystemId
fields.comment: Represents the code of the source system that the leading entity of the current target is coming from. It is suffix also include the code of the DB instance on that system such that in case of multiple instances of the same source system are deployed (Scalability) it will be possible to trace the target to it is source system instance

fields.name: DeleteIndicator
fields.comment: Set to True when the leading source entity of this target entity was deleted in the source system

fields.name: RowUpdateTime
fields.comment: The time stamp when the row was written to the Target real-time/staging storage

fields.name: SourceUpdateTime
fields.comment: The latest create/update timestamp of any of the entities composing this target entity

fields.name: SourceQueryTime
fields.comment: The timestamp of reading the data from source system. - when using CDC it is usually similar to the latest update, in SQL cases it is the time of running the SQL. When a dummy target entity is created as a temporary entity to maintain referential integrity this indicator will be set to True. As soon as the real target entity is stored it will be stored with False dummy indicator value.

fields.name: DptiId
fields.comment: Counter which represents the cycle number of the job	is_deleted	boolean	is_deleted	Represents if the record is deleted. Is been updated after the compaction job

fields.name: PTime
fields.comment: Partition time based on the event time for target entities marked to be partitioned event time rounded the correct partition window (hourly, daily etc..)

fields.name: Insert_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which inserted the record in the table

fields.name: Update_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which updated the record in the table
